title: Cradle 2 the Grave
synopsis: Master thief Anthony Fait (DMX) pulls off a major jewel heist and somehow manages to escape from the SWAT team that's pursuing him. A Taiwanese agent named Su (Jet Li) is on Fait's tail and wants to take him down so that he can retrieve the stolen black diamonds.

title: No Good Deed
synopsis: An unsuspecting Atlanta woman (Taraji P. Henson) lets in a charming stranger (Idris Elba) to use her phone and soon believes the adage 'no good deed goes unpunished' when he takes over her home and terrorizes her family.

title: OT: Our Town
synopsis: This play by Thornton Wilder represents the daily lives of people in America from 1901 to 1913. The first act describes their daily lives, the second act focuses on love and marriage, and the third act discusses death. This play is unconventional in its use of minimal sets and complete lack of props.

title: Conquest
synopsis: Two warriors wage battle against an assortment of vicious beasts and monsters dispatched by a demonic demigod.

title: Cat-Women of the Moon (a.k.a. Rocket to the Moon)
synopsis: is stabbed to death by Beta. Lambda (Susan Morrow) has fallen in love with crew member Doug (William Phipps) and tells him of the cat-woman plot.

title: Password: Uccidete agente Gordon
synopsis: A CIA agent pursues an arms-smuggling ring in order to intercept a mammoth shipment of weapons to the Viet Cong.

title: Gung Ho
synopsis: When a western Pennsylvania auto plant is acquired by a Japanese company, brokering auto worker Hunt Stevenson (Michael Keaton) faces the tricky challenge of mediating the assimilation of two clashing corporate cultures.

title: James Gandolfini: Tribute to a Friend
synopsis: This tribute to James Gandolfini is touching just because it marks the passing of a man that was larger than life and yet so down to earth.

title: Whisper of Sin (Nuodemes uzkalbejimas)
synopsis: A therapist begins to suffer from the same delusions as her patient.

title: Big Stan
synopsis: Stan is a convicted con man headed for jail. He is frightened and visits a martial arts expert to improve his feeble fighting skills. Will Stan master the moves and fend off his inmates?
